properties.description: A warm and comfortable home that is ideal for families, with illuminated rooms and a serene environment.
properties.longDescription: The warm, welcoming nature of te house makes it suitable for families, as it has a light, airy feel with a serene ambiance.The house has enough space to accommodate a family, and neighborhood around the house is also quiet and friendly.

properties.description: A fashionable modern house with intelligent design, perfectly suited to living in the city
properties.longDescription: A spacious two-roomed home with ample space to accomodate a family.The living spaces and bedrooms are spacious and well designed for comfort and functionality and there is also room in backyard for either play or entertaining friends.
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington BR5

properties.description: A large house with lots of space, ideal for large families or when accommodating guests.
properties.longDescription: This well-maintained starter home is ideal for first-time purchases, as it provides simplicity without sacrificing comfort. It's easy to move in and put personal touches on it.
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington BR5

properties.description: It is situated in a quiet and amicable surroundings, providing privacy as well as comfort.
